Text: Power database DprAutomationVar Report and PCs setting Cc PST Dear Kam The Oracle Power database has been moved The Excel Applications which are involved with the database need to be modified So does your PCs setting Please let us know when we can go to your desk for the changes The time only need minutes Thanks Min Zheng

MCommonpower folder Cc PST Dear All In Enron system Mcommonpower is one of our major folder In UBS system it is changed to Mpower I wonder whether we need to create a new folder Mcommon then move Mpower under Mcommon and become Mcommonpower just as Enron system Otherwise we at least need to spent a lot of time to find out and change all path pointers and fixed links of Excel application under power folder Also if too many files dynamic links are messed up we may be able to ask system team to rebuild power folder for us Thanks Min Zheng

RE MCommonpower folder Cc PST Dear Stacey The person should be in Roberto Deleon term X Thanks Min Zheng Original Message From White Stacey W Sent Wednesday February PM To Zheng Min Evans Casey Postlethwaite John Reeves Kathy Cc Lee Norman Subject RE MCommonpower folder Who do we ask to set up the mcommon This makes the most sense to me Stacey Original Message From Zheng Min Sent Wednesday February PM To White Stacey W Evans Casey Postlethwaite John Reeves Kathy Cc Lee Norman Subject MCommonpower folder Importance High Dear All In Enron system Mcommonpower is one of our major folder In UBS system it is changed to Mpower I wonder whether we need to create a new folder Mcommon then move Mpower under Mcommon and become Mcommonpower just as Enron system Otherwise we at least need to spent a lot of time to find out and change all path pointers and fixed links of Excel application under power folder Also if too many files dynamic links are messed up we may be able to ask system team to rebuild power folder for us Thanks Min Zheng

Could you let me know when you finish reorganization of M driver for UBS Cc PST Dear all Could you let me know when you finish reorganization of M drivers files for power then I can start to make change on the files which link to UBS database Also I need make sure the library files which are used by our system are there and function Thanks Min Zheng

DprAutomation with Financial Swap Liqudation is ready Cc PST Dear Casey JP The first version of new DprAutomation with Financial Swap Liquidation and other changes is ready for testing The set of files is saved at MPowerdevlTestSwap Liq Since the driver and folder are moving around at this moment all files in that folder must be keeping under same folder The formula for Swap Liq is the same as previous agreement Also Swap Liq have been rewritten It is automation row It can pull all files from Unix and without manually pulling them via PortCal The Calculate time for each pair deskregion also has been cut from about minutes down to about seconds Total time for adding J issue is less minutes at this time For roll files I change some tabs names to match their names in Oracle region name Otherwise DprAutomation cant work If you really need the regions names as your new rolls file I am going to find a way to hard code mapping them in DprAutomation However we think the best way is setup those change in Oracle database All files in that folder are copy files Any change only affects those copy files The tabs names I change in copy rolls are R NY Zone G NY EAST RA PJM West PJM RC NY Zone A NY WEST RD PJM EASTTERN Hub EASTTERN Hub RZ PJM WESTTERN Hub WESTTERN Hub RB TVA Into TVA RC Comed Into Comed I will continue to test optimize and polish the Swap Liq and DprAutomation Please let us know if there is any correction or any problem Thanks Min Zheng Original Message From Evans Casey Sent Monday February PM To Zheng Min Subject RE Jlatest roll filesDprAutomation Min Our latest version of the working roll is in MCommonPowerNetcoEastNetco Roll Template Working xls We are waiting on you for final revisions to J before we start copying that file to create all of our rolls Just let me know when its ready tomorrow and thanks for all your help Have a good night Casey Original Message From Zheng Min Sent Monday February PM To Evans Casey Cc Lee Norman Subject Jlatest roll filesDprAutomation Casey I have finished all big pieces of J and other which are related to DprAutomation I will put all those pieces together Since all of us need to log off of our PCs tonight I cant work tonight I will try to make the first version before end of tomorrow Also could you let me know where is your latest roll files location I need to COPY those files to my PC and have a full test on those COPY files BTW all of our accounts will be switched to UBS That change may impact PC and Excel setting I will be my desk Am Let me know if there is anything I can do Thank you Min Zheng Original Message From UBSW Energy Global Infrastructure Sent Monday February PM To DLGAallUBSW Energy Subject Information Please Read UBSW Energy Migration Attention UBS Warburg Energy Users Please be aware that IT will begin migrations to UBSW Energy this evening Please log off of your machines tonight When you arrive in the morning you will login with your Enron ID and password You will be required to change your password immediately You will also have an email in your Inbox tomorrow morning explaining your next steps If you have any questions please call Thanks UBSW Energy Global Infrastructure

Thank you for nice common which make I can still work for Enron Also I need you do me a favorDear Stacey First of all I need thank you for good common you have given to me I believe that is an main reason why I still can work for Enron As todays Netco list I am not in that list I have talked to Steve Nat He told me I am last person he took out from the list He is going to try to add me to the list He told me there is still possible to add one or two persons to the list After reading the list I found there are Gas people in Netco list and only Power people in Netco list I believe there still is possibility to ask for one more position for power people There are many types Excel reports for your groups I believe your group definitely need high level Excel VBA to support and develop those reports Some people in Netco power list do know Excel even Visual Basic but ExcelVisual Basic is far away from high level Excel VBA and there is no Excel VBA for Netco Power list I was a Access VBA before I joined Enron but at very beginning I had a lot of trouble for Excel VBA Mr Zhiyong Wei once worked on Excel VBA I took his Excel VBA responsibility after I joined Enron he knows that position very well Also his gas Excel term has persons Two are with Sr title and one Spec If Excel VBA is not necessary for our system he definitely doesnt want three high level persons This summer Mr Wei told Sanjay at front of whole my group that Min is busiest person in your group He knows my responsibility and he has seen how hard I am working He knows my working hours even more than his This year I not only have developed a lot of Excel applications but also have optimized applications and made them much more stable than I took the responsibility I was over booked for long time I take care of Excel Support and develop for your group Sanjay always promised me to hire more persons ASAP Excel in power did have three persons as Gas on In my first Enron year I lived in The Woodlands At that period most of time I took bus to work but not Bus from Woodlands because I typically needed worked hours every day and last bus is pm but Woodlands is pm I often took last bus of Sometimes I missed my last bus or sometimes there are too many works I even worked whole night at my desk Excel VBA job market is very small Only trading companies need high level Excel VBA Since that not many people want to be that area Companies which need Excel VBA have extremely hard time to hire good Excel VBA For eg Sanjay had waited for more than months and interviewed dozens people before he got Steve Skornia On other hands Excel VBA also have extremely hard time to find a job I only have moved to Houston for year I just buy a house and two new cars I have two children with age and I have given up my personal life and family life and contributed all my energy to Enron If I lost my job that will be disaster for me and my family My appreciations is more than any words can express if you could continue to give your nice common in case some one ask whether you need a Excel VBA Merry Christmas to you and your family Min Zheng

System Setting and files for UBS Cc PST Dear all Your PCs setting for Excel applications is ready for UBS This afternoon I have run some tests on JP and Andrea PCs It look fine I also copy some pure library file back to the system However I have not worked on any other file Please let me when the files can be worked For DprAutomation with J I make two versions One is for Estate since the environment in UBS are not ready for J then we have to test on Estate You may have to login as Estate to test it Another is for UBS Both of versions are at MPowerdevlTestSwap Liq JP I have to run for my last bus and am not able to run test and give you answer for your concern about Gas Shift question in new DprAutomation today I will give you an answer tomorrow Thank you Min Zheng

System setting and files for Alberta Cc PST Dear Kathy I have checked your Terminal Server The setting is ready for UBS I also copy some pure libary file or application without Enron records back to the system and your Terminal Server The Excel Version Position manager is ready for used DprAutomation has been changed The changes are on the production files Please let us know if there is any problem Thank you Min Zheng

System Setting and files for UBS Cc PST Dear all I have checked John and Frans Terminal Servers The setting is ready for UBS I also copy some pure libary file back to the system However I have not worked on any other file Please let me when the files can be worked Thank you Min Zheng
